h.rus: Visual checked state only updated on click
h.eng: Visual checked state only updated on click

p.rus: Настройте дополнительно кнопки. Контролируйте состояния кнопок, или создавайте группы кнопок увеличивая количество компонентов, как в панели инструментов.
p.eng: Do more with buttons. Control button states or create groups of buttons for more components like toolbars.

p.rus: Firefox persists form control states (disabledness and checkedness) across page loads. A workaround for this is to use autocomplete="off". See Mozilla bug #654072.
p.eng: Firefox persists form control states (disabledness and checkedness) across page loads. A workaround for this is to use autocomplete="off". See Mozilla bug #654072.

p.rus: Добавьте data-loading-text="Загружается...", чтобы использовать состояние загрузки на кнопке.
p.eng: Add data-loading-text="Loading..." to use a loading state on a button.

p.rus: For the sake of this demonstration, we are using data-loading-text and $().button('loading'), but that's not the only state you can use. See more on this below in the $().button(string) documentation.
p.eng: For the sake of this demonstration, we are using data-loading-text and $().button('loading'), but that's not the only state you can use. See more on this below in the $().button(string) documentation.

p.rus: Добавьте data-toggle="button", чтобы активировать переключение на единичном кнопке.
p.eng: Add data-toggle="button" to activate toggling on a single button.

p.rus: For pre-toggled buttons, you must add the .active class and the aria-pressed="true" attribute to the button yourself.
p.eng: For pre-toggled buttons, you must add the .active class and the aria-pressed="true" attribute to the button yourself.

p.rus: Add data-toggle="buttons" to a .btn-group containing checkbox or radio inputs to enable toggling in their respective styles.
p.eng: Add data-toggle="buttons" to a .btn-group containing checkbox or radio inputs to enable toggling in their respective styles.

p.rus: Для предварительно выбранных опций, необходимо добавить .active класс для инпутов label.
p.eng: For preselected options, you must add the .active class to the input's label yourself.

p.rus: If the checked state of a checkbox button is updated without firing a click event on the button (e.g. via <input type="reset"> or via setting the checked property of the input), you will need to toggle the .active class on the input's label yourself.
p.eng: If the checked state of a checkbox button is updated without firing a click event on the button (e.g. via <input type="reset"> or via setting the checked property of the input), you will need to toggle the .active class on the input's label yourself.

p.rus: Переключите состояние кнопки. Предоставьте кнопки вид, как будто ее активировано.
p.eng: Toggles push state. Gives the button the appearance that it has been activated.

p.rus: Сброс состояния кнопки - изменение текста на первоначальный текст.
p.eng: Resets button state - swaps text to original text.

p.rus: Изменение текста на любой указанный текст состояния.
p.eng: Swaps text to any data defined text state.

label.rus: <input type="radio" name="options" id="option1" autocomplete="off" checked> Radio 1 (preselected)
label.eng: <input type="radio" name="options" id="option1" autocomplete="off" checked> Radio 1 (preselected)

button.rus: <input type="radio" name="options" id="option1" autocomplete="off" checked> Radio 1 (preselected)
button.eng: <input type="radio" name="options" id="option1" autocomplete="off" checked> Radio 1 (preselected)
